[en] Everyone always asks... but do you guys ever get cold?
Well, we do, but only if we are outside the van! Hahaha! Because inside it's super cozy. Besides having made a good thermal insulation, we also installed a diesel heater.

[en] We set up our water system so that we could have as much autonomy as possible, since we would also have a shower in the van, which uses a lot of water!
We opted for a 115 litre tank and, in addition, we also have a boiler that produces the hot water with storage capacity for another 13 litres.

Everything is pumped by a 12V pump and the system also includes a device that helps remove air from the pipes so that there is no problem, a device through which we fill the tank and an external shower outlet.
Inside we also have the internal shower outlet and the sink tap, of course! Both also with the possibility of using hot water.
So far we are quite happy with it, having an autonomy of 5/7 days and always finding easy ways to refill on the way!
